name: Call Snowman
description:
Calling Today The Snowman by click on Start button and make fun with your friends and Children . Call Snowman is for fun, Share close, let think that phoning your favorite Snowman! Make fun of a lot of fun! In the game you can choose different calls for a call! A real blast and a voice straight out of the tube!

Features:

- 6 Snowman Model.
- Great Sounds & Design
- Phone Ringtone.
- Options to decline, or, accept call.
- Easy to use for All Age.

Enjoy with your friends And Your Children .
